article_title: How Will The Silicon Valley Split-Up Saga Affect Health Care?

article_metadata.author: Robert Pearl, M.D.

og.description: In recent months, Silicon Valley has surpassed Hollywood as America’s home for high-profile split ups. But how will the tech industry’s recent split-up saga influence the business of health care? Dr. Pearl examines the future of health care through this lens.
